column5: a 20-year-old KTV woman called Linda was beaten by a Chinese man who was with a group of 10 Chinese  drinking at Sabay KTV on street 430
column8: Phnom Penh.------Locals said that a group of 10 Chinese men went to the KTV
column9: then at 2 am a fight broke out when a Chinese man beat the victim
column10: and the KTV security services had to step in and break it up.------After the incident
column11: the victim asked for US$200 compensation
column12: and the Chinese man agreed to pay it to end the argument.
